about_the_game:
Start by giving other boxers a taste of what it means to rise from the bottom to become the champion. In this CHAMPION SIMULATOR, you begin as a weaker boxer, training hard at home to build your strength and skills. As you progress, you'll step into street fights, where you can earn both money and respect. With your earnings, you’ll be able to upgrade your training by accessing a real gym, allowing you to see better results. Finally, with enough resources and determination, you can secure a pro card to enter official tournaments, aiming for the ultimate goal: becoming the CHAMPION!

This demo offers a glimpse into the grind, determination, and strategy required to turn an underdog into a champion. Dive into the key features and start your journey to the top!

content_descriptors.notes: Beause it is a boxing game , there is fight , blood and tears. You should expect fighters fighting.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10/11
  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10/11
  • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Start as a novice boxer training at home. Earn money and respect in street fights, then upgrade to a real gym for better results. With enough progress, get a pro card to enter tournaments. Your goal? To rise through the ranks and become the CHAMPION! Ready to prove yourself?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Russian, Turkish
